title: Stock Central products lists
intro:
In Stock Central, you will find two different products lists:
Controlled = You are thoroughly monitoring all your products by ATUM.
Uncontrolled = Product in this list are not monitored and only show essential data.

title: Restock Status
intro: Restock Status: The system uses this formula to display the products on Restock Status within Stock Central: The average sales per day for the last week * Days to reorder. We calculate the average sales by adding the sales of the product of the last week and dividing by 7.

title: Search feature
intro:
You can use the search feature to search for any products within Stock Central.

To search for products:

  • Select the column you want to search in the dropdown.
  • Enter the product name, SKU, or product ID. All products containing the search text automatically appear.
If you want results to only appear after you press Search, you can turn off auto-search by going to Settings > General and then disabling the Enable Filter Autosearch option. Click Update Settings to activate the changes.

title: Sticky Columns
intro: You can enable the sticky columns by clicking on the Toggle Sticky Columns Icon at the top right of the table.

title: Sticky Header
intro: You can enable the sticky header by clicking on the Toggle Sticky Header Icon at the top right of the table.

title: Bulk Actions
intro:
You can change the Stock Manager (WooCommerce or ATUM) for each product with bulk actions. To apply bulk actions:

  • Select the products you wish.

  • Select the action in the Bulk Actions dropdown.

Available bulk actions (Controlled List):

  • Enable WC's Manage Stock: To enable the WooCommerce Manage Stock option in selected products.

  • Disable WC's Manage Stock: To disable the WooCommerce Manage Stock option in selected products.

  • Disable ATUM's Stock Control: To disable the ATUM's Stock Control option in selected products. These products will go to the Uncontrolled List.

Available bulk actions (Uncontrolled List):

  • Enable WC's Manage Stock: To enable the WooCommerce Manage Stock option in selected products.

  • Disable WC's Manage Stock: To disable the WooCommerce Manage Stock option in selected products.

  • Enable ATUM's Stock Control: To Enable the ATUM's Stock Control option in selected products. These products will go to theControlled List.
